effects: Increase resistance to Paralyze, Confusion and Petrify by 100%
Use Light-footed+1 (505960) at the start of a battle or when revived
name: Light-footed
Light-footed
最快的空賊
가장 빠른 하늘의 도적
Pas léger
Leichtfüßig
Pies raudos
desc_short: Chance of dodging some physical or magic attacks, nullify paralysis, confusion, and stone, and caster can dodge some physical attacks one time at the beginning of battle or after being revived
一定機率閃避物理、魔法攻擊+麻痺混亂石化無效+戰鬥開始時和從無法戰鬥狀態中復活時可防住1次物理攻擊
일정 확률로 일부 물리, 마법공격 회피+마비, 혼란, 석화 무효화+전투 시작 시 및 전투불능 상태에서 회복했을 때 사용자에게 일부 물리공격 1회 회피 효과 부여

Chance d'esquiver certaines attaques magiques ou physiques, annule la paralysie, confusion et pétrification, et le lanceur peut esquiver certaines attaques physiques au début du combat ou après résurrection
Chance, einigen phys. oder mag. Angriffen auszuweichen + annulliert Lähmung, Konfus und Stein und Benutzer kann zu Beginn des Kampfes oder nach Wiederbelebung einigen phys. Angriff ausweichen.
Puede esquivar algunos ataques físicos y mágicos, anula par, con y pie, y el usuario puede esquivar algunos ataques físicos al comienzo del combate o tras ser revivido
